dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 29, 2005 7:28 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
From:         - Tue Mar 29 19:13:06 2005
X-Mozilla-Status:         0001
X-Mozilla-Status2:         00000000
Received:         from [172.16.214.181] (helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by
mail.theplanet.com with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim
4.50) id 1DGRAh-0005Y5-Pb for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Tue, 29 Mar 2005
18:34:59 -0600
Received:         from spooling.theplanet.com ([69.56.141.4]
helo=lili.theplanet.com) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com) with smtp (Exim) id 1DGRAd-0003Kl-MK for
abuseadm@theplanet.com; Tue, 29 Mar 2005 18:34:59 -0600
Received:         (qmail 20761 invoked from network); 30 Mar 2005 00:34:55
-0000
Received:         from unknown (HELO ?216.185.111.52?) (172.16.214.110) by
lili.theplanet.com with SMTP; 30 Mar 2005 00:34:55 -0000
Received:         from [172.16.214.180] (helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by
mail.theplanet.com with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim
4.50) id 1DGRAZ-0005WL-Sd; Tue, 29 Mar 2005 18:34:51 -0600
Received:         from imo-m25.mx.aol.com ([64.12.137.6]) by
mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from KirkAWA@aol.com) with esmtp
(Exim) id 1DGRAV-000Ilc-2G; Tue, 29 Mar 2005 18:34:51 -0600
Received:         from KirkAWA@aol.com by imo-m25.mx.aol.com
(mail_out_v37_r5.33.) id j.1e8.381b04af (3972); Tue, 29 Mar 2005 19:34:40
-0500 (EST)
From:         KirkAWA@aol.com
Message-ID:         <1e8.381b04af.2f7b4e20@aol.com>
Date:         Tue, 29 Mar 2005 19:34:40 EST
To:         abuse@theplanet.com, legal@theplanet.com
MIME-Version:         1.0
Content-Type:         multipart/alternative;
boundary="-----------------------------1112142880"
X-Mailer:         9.0 for Windows sub 5117
Received-SPF:         pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of aol.com
designates 64.12.137.6 as permitted sender) client-ip=64.12.137.6;
envelope-from=KirkAWA@aol.com; helo=imo-m25.mx.aol.com;
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -97.6
Cc:         
Subject:         [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement
X-BeenThere:         abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version:         2.1.5
Precedence:         list
List-Id:         abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post:         <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help:         <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -98.7



Please note the letter and email sent to Mr. Crosby, below.

Mr. Crosby,
The following letter was just now faxed to your office and a hardcopy is in
the US Mail.









March 29, 2005

Lance Crosby, Esq.

Chief Operating Officer

The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc., and all its subsidiaries

1333 Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas, Texas   75207



Dear Mr. Crosby,

~            This letter serves as a Notification of Claimed Infringement
of Copyright. We request that you immediately and expeditiously remove or
disable access to the material that we claim you are infringing, and that
you notify us to substantiate that the material has been removed or that
access has been disabled. I have copied this letter to our attorney, Greg
Miller, of law firm Birch, Horton, Bittner, Cherot of Anchorage, Alaska, and
Washington, DC, and Mr. Miller will follow up with any action, if necessary.



~            The site in which you host, www.travelsalaska.com
<http://www.travelsalaska.com/>, has been substantially hijacked from our
website, www.alaskawildland.com <http://www.alaskawildland.com/>.
Our website is copyrighted, and contains copyrighted content, photographs,
and images. The entire www.travelsalaska.com <http://www.travelsalaska.com/>
is an exact replica of our site, www.alaskawildland.com
<http://www.alaskawildland.com/>, with the exception that you have altered
our copyrighted logo with travelsalaska.com. Your use of our copyrighted
material is not authorized by Alaska Wildland Adventures and is in violation
of the law.



~            You can contact me at Alaska Wildland Adventures, PO Box
389, Girdwood, Alaska 99587; phone 907 783 2928; fax 907 783 2130; and via
email at kirk@alaska-wildland.com <mailto:kirk@alaska-wildland.com> or
kirkawa@aol.com <mailto:kirkawa@aol.com>. I hereby notify you that this
information and the claims herein are accurate, and, under the penalty of
perjury, I am authorized to act on behalf of Alaska Wildland Adventures and
its exclusive rights that are infringed.




Respectfully,








Kirk Hoessle


President



cc: Greg Miller, Attorney, Birch, Horton, Bittner, Cherot




_____________________________________________________
Kirk Hoessle, President
Alaska Wildland Adventures
PO Box 389
Girdwood, Alaska 99587
Phone: 907.783.2928 Fax: 907.783.2130
http://www.alaskawildland.com/
http://www.alaskasportfish.com/
http://www.alaskarivertrips.com/

Why is it Alaska seems that much bigger when you travel with smaller groups?


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCSgCDvK/XpJs6oyURApt0AJ41oWhNIpCy+cwp+h92h+G1u09cSgCfYjAd
3OMKK9lL3OdmtUfcWEZTr3g=
=G50n
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
